name: Remixing Criticism - Hip Hop dance under the microscope
name_original: Remixing Criticism - Hip Hop dance under the microscope
description:
A robust and text based interactive critique of Hip Hop, dance, criticism, institutional power and the erasure of women in the UK.

Part outsider commentary, part reflective essay and part detailed critique; Remixing Criticism - Hip Hop dance under the microscope blends styles, approaches and formalities to offer a new perspective of Hip Hop dance in the UK.
